items.sentence: If you want to speak to me, please call me up.
I will write letters to you as often as I can.
I wish that we could spend more time together.
I wonder how long this cold weather will last.
I wonder what inspired Tom to write that song?
I wonder why my name is no longer on the list.
In basketball, tall players have an advantage.
In those days, few people could travel abroad.
I think it\'s time for me to lose some weight.
I think reading novels isn\'t a waste of time.
